test_scenarios.name: P0 - User Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the user dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: P0 - Schedule and Start a Meeting
steps: Enter basic meeting details (Topic, Date, Time)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Meeting starts successfully, opening Zoom desktop application or prompting to download and install if not already present.

test_scenarios.name: P0 - Join a Meeting
steps: Receive a meeting invitation link (e.g., from email or calendar).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Zoom application opens (or prompts to download and install), and the user joins the meeting with audio and video enabled (if default settings allow).
